abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})

data_description.enable_smart_home_mode:
The Smart Home Mode is a system related entity in the myUplink API.

If a system has only one single device, the Smart Home Mode will be added to this device. Otherwise the Smart Home Mode will be added to an additional device, that is based on the available system information.

The support of the Smart Home Mode requires one additional API call per system.
data_description.fetch_firmware: Requires an additional API call per device.
data_description.fetch_notifications: Requires an additional API call per system.
data_description.disconnected_available: Show parameter entities of disconnected devices as `available`.

data_description.platform_override:
Force a specific platform for a given parameter ID.

This is sometimes necessary if the myUplink API provides incorrect parameter data and the integration detects the wrong platform.

Must be valid JSON. To restore the default, invalidate the field and save. An empty field will cause no change.
data_description.writable_override:
Set specific parameter to writeable or not writeable.

This is sometimes necessary if the myUplink API provides the wrong state for the paramter option `writable`.

Must be valid JSON. To restore the default, invalidate the field and save. An empty field will cause no change.
data_description.parameter_whitelist:
Restriction of the requested parameters to a specific list of parameter IDs.

This can be useful if the myUplink API provides an extremely large number of parameters, some of which are unimportant, and you want to restrict the available list of parameters.

List of parameter IDs separated by commas. An empty list does not result in any restriction. Must be valid JSON. To restore the default, invalidate the field and save. An empty field does not result in any change.
data_description.additional_parameter:
Add additional parameter IDs to the query.

In extremely rare cases, the myUplink API does not provide all available parameters. With this list, it is possible to add known parameter IDs, which are then queried directly.

Comma-separated list of parameter IDs. An empty list does not result in any restrictions. Must be valid JSON. To restore the default, invalidate the field and save. An empty field does not result in any changes.

set_device_parameter_value.name: Set device parameter to value
set_device_parameter_value.description: Service for setting any parameter identified by ID for a specific device to the desired value.

device_id.name: myUplink Device
device_id.description: Select the myUplink device the parameter belongs to.

parameter_id.name: myUplink Parameter ID
parameter_id.description: Enter the id of the parameter point in the myUplink API.
